channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.description:
Litter bins full and litter everywhere. Broken glass around benches. Hazardous waste.

Fly tipping

item.title: Massive Potholes all along city road between featherstone street and epworth street., 28th July
item.description:
The Potholes are very large, busses are bouncing and when im standing in the bus i need to brace myself. The noise of busses and trucks going over this sounds like thunder. I have also cycled on this part of the road and i genuinely had to slow down to near walking pace just to stay on my bicycle. It has been there for over one year and is getting progressively worse. I would urge you to please go and have a look, potentially get on one of the busses heading south and you will be shocked. I know there is constantly building works in and around the area which are degrading these roads, but this must be considered for the residents of the area to at least have safe roads. Thank you very much
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 55-71, City Road, Finsbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A small evergreen tree close to the pavement overhanging, 28th July
item.description:
This smaller tree is growing sideways and now hangs over the pavement below head height. It had to be pruned last year for the same reason. Please deal as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Elm Road, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Abandoned scooter in woodland. Needs removing please. I’m sharing a what3words address to help you find this specific location. Tap to see exactly where it is: ///kinds.wished.jacket https://w3w.co/kinds.wished.jacket

item.title: Algae build up - canal, 28th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Austen Close, Thamesmead, London

item.title: Pavement obstacle outside frontage of health centre, 28th July
item.description:
I was on my electric scooter. I turned the corner from Birkbeck Road on to the pavement outside the health centre and nearly got tossed into the road by a pavement hillock. Please flatten it as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Granville Road, Albany Park, London

item.title: Broken draws with nails sticking out, 28th July

item.title: Gas cannisters, 28th July
item.description:
A dozen gas canisters plus the usual bedding g rubbish left at the open rubbish dump at the corner of York St and Upper Montagu St. Still no notice on the bins saying LEAVE NO RUBNISH ON THE FOOTPATH.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Upper Montagu Street, Marylebone, London

item.title: Wooden Post is broken in Chelsfield Lane, 28th July
item.description:
Sorry didn’t know what category to place this under - wooden post need fixing in Chelsfield Lane on grass verge on right hand side going towards Chelsfield outside house number 32 thx

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chelsfield Lane, Ramsden, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cycling on the footpath, 28th July
item.description:
This morning while walking my dog along the Eastbury Road to St Johns Road tortuous footpath, we were almost hit head-on by a man on a bicycle. He apologized and said there are no "No Cycling" signs. He was right. Please could "No Cycling" signs be placed at each end of the footpath, as cyclists frequently use this footpath.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St Johns Road, Petts Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish litter not being cleaned by street sweepers in Allendale Close, 28th July
item.description:
This rubbish has been on the footpath and road of Allendale Close for the last 5 days and not swept up by the street cleaners. This section of Allendale Close (from Daneville Road to 28-71 Allendale Close) is ignored by the street sweepers on a constant basis. Whilst Daneville Road is cleaned every day, this section (from Daneville Road to 28-71 Allendale Close) of Allendale Close is noticeably ignored. Could this be escalated and addressed ASAP please. Thank you!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 80, Allendale Close, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Untaxed/No MOT Car dumped in Blenheim Shopping Centre Car Park, 28th July
item.description:
There is a car taking up much needed car parking spot in the Blenheim Car Park. It's taxed and not MOT (which I guess is ok because it's not on a public road) but still - it's just been left there and the space it is in is a large one that people with mobility would appreciated.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ospringe Close, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet
